mapper.select: select roles.id, roles.name, roles.code, code.name as codeName, roles.type, type.name as typeName from sys_users sys_user join sys_user_in_role uir on sys_user.id = uir.user_id and uir.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.id = #{userId} join sys_roles roles on uir.role_id = roles.id and roles.is_deleted = 0 and roles.is_locked = 0 left join sys_code code on roles.code = code.value and code.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_code type on roles.type = type.value and type.is_deleted = 0

select organization.id, organization.code, organization.parent_id, organization.parent_code, organization.name, oei.is_platform from sys_users sys_user join member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio on sys_user.id = mieiuio.user_id and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.is_deleted = 0 and sys_user.id = #{userId} join sys_organizations organization on mieiuio.organization_id = organization.id and organization.is_deleted = 0 and organization.is_locked = 0 join organization_extra_info oei on oei.organization_id = organization.id and oei.is_deleted = 0 order by organization.sequence

select count(so.id) from sys_organizations so join organization_extra_info oei on oei.is_platform = 0 and oei.is_deleted = 0 and so.id = oei.organization_id join member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio on mieiuio.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0 where so.is_deleted = 0 and so.code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(mieiuio.id) from member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio join organization_extra_info oei on oei.organization_id = mieiuio.organization_id and oei.is_deleted = 0 and oei.is_platform = 0 where mieiuio.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0

select ei.id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_code, ei.employee_note_name, ei.employee_class, sc.name employeeClassName, ei.avatar from employee_info ei join member_in_employee_in_user_in_organization mieiuio on mieiuio.employee_id = ei.id and mieiuio.is_deleted = 0 and mieiuio.user_id = #{usersId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} left join sys_code sc on sc.value = ei.employee_class and sc.is_deleted = 0 where ei.is_deleted = 0
